short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome plugin adding a new inspector pane to the Elements panel, providing Aurelia-specific information about selected elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Increases developer productivity by finding Aurelia 2 specific  sites and elements and allows for manipulation to see outcomes from bindable and local view model properties.
- Identifies sites that are using Aurelia 2 .
- Allows identification and manipulation of Aurelia 2 Custom Elements and attributes via inspect window.
